title: Seeing Red
description: Love lost and found. Betrayal. Death. Revenge. Seeing Red: It's one for the horrors.Here is the first major collection of short stories by the award-winning author of The Kill Riff and The Outer Limits: The Official Companion. Schow received the World Fantasy Award for 'Red Light' and the Twilight Zone Magazine Dimension award for 'Coming Soon to a Theatre Near You', both of which are included in this volume.
author: David J. Schow
